headline: Is Federal Realty (FRT) Pricing Lagging Its Cash Flow And P/E Valuation Signals?
summary: If you are wondering whether Federal Realty Investment Trust is fairly priced at around US$100.59, you are not alone. A closer look at its valuation can help you frame that question more clearly. Over the shorter term, the stock shows a 1.1% decline over 7 days, a 1.2% decline over 30 days, a 1.6% gain year to date, and a 2.8% decline over the last year, which can suggest shifting views on its risk and return profile. Recent coverage has focused on Federal Realty Investment Trust's position...
